data.text: Waaqayyo, Humna Qabeessi dubbatee
Xiyoon ishee miidhaginni ishee
Waaqni keenya ni dhufa; hin calʼisus;
Inni saba isaatti muruuf jedhee,
“Qulqulloota koo warra aarsaadhaan na wajjin kakuu galan,
Samiiwwan qajeelummaa isaa ni labsu;
“Yaa saba ko, nan dubbadhaatii dhagaʼi;
Ani aarsaa keetiif sitti hin dheekkamu;
Ani dallaa kee keessaa korma,
Bineensi bosonaa hundinuu,
Ani simbirroota tulluuwwan irraa hunda beeka;
Ani utuun beelaʼee iyyuu sitti hin himadhu ture;
Ani foon korommii nan nyaadhaa?
“Aarsaa galataa Waaqaaf dhiʼeessi; wareega kee illee
guyyaa rakkinaa na waammadhu;
Waaqni garuu nama hamaadhaan akkana jedha:
Ati adaba koo ni jibbita;
Ati yoo hattuu argite isa michuu godhatta;
Ati afaan kee waan hamaa dubbachuuf itti fayyadamta;
Ati teessee obboleessa kee hamatta;
Ati waan kana hunda hojjetteerta; ani immoo inuma calʼise;
“Isin warri Waaqa irraanfattan waan kana hubadhaa;
Namni aarsaa galataa dhiʼeessu ulfina naa kenna;
